author: slessard
msg: Tweak for getCurrentComposite component to ensure that UIComponent.CURRENT_COMPOSITE_COMPONENT is always in sync

author: markt
msg: Correct sync issue that leads to NPE in rare circumstances

author: sebb
msg: Add missing tests compared with pom.xml

author: markt
msg: Limit package test to just the o.a.jsp package to allow use of packages such as o.a.jspwiki

author: sobryan
msg: Some comments were made about the release.  This addresses those issues
* Added a plugin which will add NOTICE and LISCENCE to the generated javadoc
* Changed the NOTICE.txt files in subprojects to NOTICE to comply with Apache standards
* Deleted the liscence so the Remote Resource Plugin can pull the latest liscense from Apache
* Deleted the portlet1.0 faces config extensions
* Modified the assembly project to include the correct NOTICE and LISCENSE
